snippet.title: Capy Island Opening Cutscene
snippet.description:
Opening cutscene for Capy Island

Capy Island is a party game where players, who are capybaras, play minigames on an island to collect hats. These hats will give them a step up in the final showdown where they will all battle it out. The capybara with the most hats wins!

For IMD4901 Senior Capstone Project by Sawfish Studios @ Carleton University
September 2022-April 2023

Play Capy Island here: https://capyisland.itch.io/game
Capy Island website: https://capyisland.wixsite.com/capystone
Portfolio: https://amytr.com/

Created using Adobe Illustrator and After Effects
